attributes.action: Reset the academic year in Sep 2021 and give children a chance to catch up.
attributes.additional_details: It’s only fair that children have the opportunity to have a full year of school.
attributes.background: Children and schools need to redo the current academic year therefore hold back all students for another year.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566160
